content.rendered: A month before the nationwide lockdown was implemented, the Sto. Nino School of Muntinlupa celebrated its 34th Foundation Anniversary on February 10-14, 2020. Thousands of spectators, mostly students, parents, alumni and other stakeholders participated in some of the weeklong activities. The crowd favorite Field Demonstration offered the audience new perspectives about interconnectedness in the diverse Filipino society. The homegrown contests that include Cosplay, Search for Mr. and Ms. SNSM, Singgaya, and Hataw Nino gathered hundreds of audience within the village. Now on its 9th year, the SNSM Independent Film Festival garnered positive reviews from the viewing public.
